intro.text: Complete brand identity design for a dynamic coffee brand targeting young professionals and energy-conscious consumers.

content.content: Charger Coffee approached us to create a bold, energetic brand identity that would appeal to busy professionals and coffee enthusiasts seeking premium quality and convenience.
The challenge was to create a brand that conveys energy and vitality while maintaining the premium quality and sophistication expected in the competitive coffee market.
We developed a dynamic brand system that combines bold typography with energetic color palettes, creating a brand that truly embodies the 'charge' concept.

content.caption: Brand application in retail and cafe spaces
